name.value: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description.value: This data item records the behaviour of the neoplasm at time of diagnosis according to ICD-O. **ICD-O Behaviour (Variable number: 3.6.1)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.1, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children\' see [Nationale Krebsregistrierungsstelle](https://www.nkrs.ch) > Partner im Gesundheitswesen > [Information, Grundlagen und Datenstruktur zum KRG](https://www.nicer.org/assets/files/krebsregistrierung/datadictionary_e-g-f-i.zip).

definition.value: Benign tumours do not metastasize or locally invade tissues.
Uncertain whether benign or malignant. Low, borderline, or uncertain malignant potential.
Carcinoma in situ; intraepithelial; non-infiltrating; non-invasive.
